text:
Saw this: Looking for an animation short course in Bristol? Sun & Moon Animation have 3 new courses running this September in Toon Boom Harmony, Adobe After Effects and Adobe Animate. Check it out and get signed up, there‚Äôs even an early bird deal until the end of August!  Check it out below :slightly_smiling_face:

<https://lnkd.in/emiNtKr>

attachments.title: Sun & Moon on LinkedIn: "Ever wanted to learn Toon Boom Harmony, Adobe Animate or After Effects? Well now's your chance! :grin:  Come learn with us! :tada:  We are now offering industry focused animation courses to help you with a career in animation. Led by working industry professionals, our courses teach you the skills, techniques and tricks of the trade gained from years of experience. Even better, the courses are all taught in a working studio environment.  Check out our full list of courses and get signed up! :woman::mortar_board:  https://lnkd.in/eiSTraC   #sunandmoonstudios #animation #bristol #animationstudio #work #learn #adobe #animate #toonboom #harmony #backtoschool #aftereffects #courses #eventbrite  #industry"
attachments.text: August 22, 2019: Sun & Moon posted on LinkedIn
